Description: White glazed composition shabti of Khaemwaset with purple detail: a lappet-wig, a modelled face, a collar and crossed hands with bracelets holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a yoke with two nw-pots and a long seed-basket(?).
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Maj William Joseph Myers (?)
